content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was discussing the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. We agreed to negotiate later when I had time to think about it.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The negotiation was ongoing, and I requested time to consider the proposed price of 950 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not reach a final agreement, I cannot rate my satisfaction with the outcome. I would need to come back with a decision after considering the offer.
name: Peter Schmidt
